item.description:
The film starts at 7:10, but we are going to want to go in and find seats by 6:30 or so. I will be at the theater by 6 so the group can start to gather.

The tickets for this movie are already on Fandango and will probably sell out, so plan ahead.

If the movie is playing upstairs I will be near the windows at the top of the escalator and if it is downstairs I will be just inside the ropes in front of the concession stand.

If you don't find the group before the movie, we will gather outside the auditorium where the film is being played after the movie to discuss a bit and also to decide where to go for drinks and munchies.

Show details:

Star Trek

Starring: John Cho, Ben Cross, Bruce Greenwood, Simon Pegg, Chris Pine, Zachary Quinto, Winona Ryder, Zoe Saldana, Karl Urban, Anton Yelchin, Eric Bana, Leonard Nimoy

Official Website:

http://www.startrekmo...

Plot Summary: From director J.J. Abrams ("Mission: Impossible III," "Lost" and "Alias") and screenwriters Roberto Orci & Alex Kurtzman ("Transformers," "MI: III") comes a new vision of the greatest space adventure of all time, "Star Trek," featuring a young, new crew venturing boldly where no man has gone before.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be wearing a Boston Movie Group Badge.
item.name: Star Trek
